title: Order of Operations
text: Be sure to follow the order of operations. Multiplication comes before subtraction, so we will distribute the $$2$$ first and then subtract.

title: Distributive Property
text: If a, $$b$$, c are real numbers, then $$a \left(b+c\right)=a b+a c$$.
